Entries.Saloon4: Good evening. Make yourself at home.#$e#%Gus leans in close so no one else can hear.#$b#If you need to change you can use my room. It's private.$1
Entries.Saloon8: Must be nice to just go wherever… I’m holding a big one in, now, honestly.#$b#I can't just step away when the saloon is packed!$1
Entries.Mon2: Yeah, I know a lot about the people living here.#$e#That's one of the benefits of being a bartender.$h#$e#Sometimes I hear too much...#$b#%Gus winks and glances down at your pants.
Entries.Sat4: Are you much of a chef, @?#$e#If you have a kitchen and some recipes, you can cook some useful dishes.#$e#Though it's easier picturing you getting fed than doing the cooking!$1
